description:
This course is for pest control business owners that are looking to generate online leads using WordPress as a lead generate magnet. You will be taught how to setup your WordPress site using a lead generate theme that we provide in the course. We explain exactly how to set it up and how to start generating leads

This course should not take you more than a few days to go through. As your instructor I will be here every step of the way if you need assistance

If you are struggling to get leads online or are tired of sharing leads through some of the online service providers than this course if for you. After taking the course you will no longer have to pay an insane amount of money for shared leads that do not lead to a sale for your business
title: Pest Control Marketing: Get More Customers Using WordPress
